issue.title: [Python] Mention alternatives in deprecation message of ParquetDataset attributes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13525](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13525). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up on ARROW-13074. 

We should maybe also expose the `partitioning` attribute on ParquetDataset (if constructed with `use_legacy_dataset=False`), as I did for the `filesystem`/`files`/`fragments` attributes.
